overview.en: This card is issued to commemorate the first step of WePiggy's cross-chain deployment plan: OKExChain. "LuckyPiggy" means, OKExChain brings piggy big luck. Holder of this NFT will be blessed by WePiggy with the buff of "Super Lucky".
overview.zh: 此卡用以纪念 WePiggy 跨链部署的第一步：登陆 OKExChain。“欧气” 源于 OKExChain。欧气满满，即“运气满满”。持有此卡可获得由 WePiggy 加持的“欧气满满，大吉大利“状态。
